methodStep.title: {{name of the transporting activity}}
methodStep.dataSource: {{Reference to the sample that served as the source in the transporting activity}}
methodStep.from: {{reference to the location that is the starting point of the transporting activity}}
methodStep.to: {{reference to the location that is the destination of the transporting activity}}
methodStep.associatedParty: {{description/reference to the agent(s) associated with the activity}}
